messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re. permaculture
messages.msgSnippet: ... Mine WAS, but has backslid.  This is driving me crazy!  I need to learn all those communication tips at this late stage in life.  Guess I have to try
messages.messageBody:
>My dh is not a great talker.

Mine WAS, but has backslid. This is driving me crazy! I need to learn all
those communication tips at this late stage in life. Guess I have to try
weeding with him! :-)

Betsy

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re. permaculture
messages.msgSnippet: Car talks are great.  In fact we bought a car without a radio to foster that very thing.  The older kids were just becoming teenagers & keeping more to
messages.messageBody:
Car talks are great. In fact we bought a car without a radio to foster that
very thing. The older kids were just becoming teenagers & keeping more to
themselves. Plus we were trying to save money.

messages.subject: Re. permaculture
messages.msgSnippet: Betsy I do agree with you regarding *talking in the car*. My dh is not a great talker.  Occasionally dh will take dd to work with him.  He is a courier. Every
messages.messageBody:
Betsy
I do agree with you regarding *talking in the car*.
My dh is not a great talker. Occasionally dh will take dd to work
with him. He is a courier. Every time she goes, he always comes home
and says what a wonderful time they had and how they chatted all day.
marianne
